resources.string: Change or remove the reading for a particular day

Please set up the dates and readings of your previous cycles.
 If you do not set the dates, today's date will be considered as the last date of the cycles by default.
 In case you do not remember the last reading, then you must update the meter reading for two days, to start getting results.
 Once you're done, press back to return to the main screen
It\'s been 30 days since your cycle started. If it has ended, please update the settings
This app is brought developed by Zenatix
This application is currently only useful for people living in Delhi
Water tariff used (per unit): Rs 2.66 (0-10),Rs 3.99 (10-20), Rs 19.97 (20-30),Rs 33.28f (>30) \n Electricity tariff used (per unit): Rs 4 (0-200),Rs 5.45 (200-400),Rs 7.95 (>400)
We use linear interpolation of daily usage to calculate the predicted consumption and estimated bill

Subsidies that are included for calculation of costs are as per the government order dated February 26 that gives up to 20 KL of water free for each connection and 50% subsidy on electricity consumption (for consumption less than 400 units a month)
Estimated bill is only based on price per unit and does not include any other charges and taxes
